channel.title: Updates: CFPB Enforcement Database Documentation [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's CFPB Enforcement Database Documentation request

item.title: Request Partially Fulfilled
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On April 14, 2023, CFPB emailed a determination letter ðŸ“„ and six pages of responsive records ðŸ“„, saying that this was all that their search turned up. The Data Liberation Project believes more records are likely responsive, and is inquiring with the CFPB about this.

item.title: Request Acknowledged
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On February 17, 2023, CFPB emailed a letter acknowledging our request ðŸ“„. In a separate email, agency also noted that it changed the request tracking number from CFPB-2023-0005-F-P to CFPB-2023-0206-F.
